content:
Micronuclei formation after misrepaired DSBs increases chromothripsis and neoplasia risk, and micronuclei frequency in precancerous lesions could serve as a prognostic biomarker for aggressive cancer subtypes.  
*Supporting evidence:* Micronuclei are linked to chromothripsis and tumorigenesis [Zhang 2015]. Micronucleus assays are predictive of cancer risk [Fenech 2011, Mutagenesis].
